name: Mailjet Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Mailjet Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Mailjet API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Mailjet API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: email

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: send

fromEmail.name: fromEmail
fromEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: From Email | 作用: The title for the email | (必填项)

toEmail.name: toEmail
toEmail.description: Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.
toEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Email | 作用: Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma. | (必填项)

subject.name: subject
subject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: Subject line of the email

html.name: html
html.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTML | 作用: HTML text message of email

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: bccEmail (值: None) - BCC Recipients of the email separated by ,
ccEmail (值: None) - Cc recipients of the email separated by ,
replyTo (值: None) - The reply-to email address. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.
trackClicks (值: None) - Enable or disable open tracking on this message
trackOpens (值: None) - Enable or disable open tracking on this message

variablesJson.name: variablesJson
variablesJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Variables (JSON) | 作用: HTML text message of email

variablesUi.name: variablesUi
variablesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Variables | 默认值: {}

templateId.name: templateId
templateId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
templateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Template Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

from.name: from
from.description: Customizable sender name. Should be between 3 and 11 characters in length, only alphanumeric characters are allowed.
from.natural_language_description: 参数名: From | 作用: Customizable sender name. Should be between 3 and 11 characters in length, only alphanumeric characters are allowed. | (必填项)

to.name: to
to.description: Message recipient. Should be between 3 and 15 characters in length. The number always starts with a plus sign followed by a country code, followed by the number. Phone numbers are expected to comply with the E.164 format.
to.natural_language_description: 参数名: To | 作用: Message recipient. Should be between 3 and 15 characters in length. The number always starts with a plus sign followed by a country code, followed by the number. Phone numbers are expected to comply with the E.164 format. | (必填项)
